snippet.title: Cold and Flu
snippet.description:
* Cold and Flu Cold and flu are two conditions that have similar symptoms. Cases of each increase in colder months. Neither are curable but both can be prevented and treated.
Learn the Basics \- Prevent Getting Sick \- Find Your Remedy \- Treating Your Kids
